name: River King
description: The River King is a medium-sized fey with remarkable agility, characterized by its ability to control both water and weather while excelling in combat with magical weapon attacks.
memorable: The River King's ability to control water and use powerful spells makes it a formidable foe, especially in aquatic environments.
goals: To dominate and manipulate waterways, and protect its territory while engaging intruders.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures and possibly serves a greater fey lord.
environment: Typically found near rivers, lakes, and other bodies of water.
strengths: Immunity to poison, significant damage resistances, and powerful battlefield control abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to nonmagical attacks not made with cold iron.
attacks: Can make magical attacks with both melee long sword strikes and a powerful Flood Blast ranged attack that pushes opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Grasping Whirlpool: Creates a vortex that restrains and damages any caught enemies.
senses: The River King possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even in complete darkness.
skills: Proficient in intimidation, nature, perception, and stealth, making it a capable combatant and environmental manipulator.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
All weapon attacks are magical and deal additional poison damage.
Can breathe both air and water with the Amphibious trait.
Can manipulate water and weather through spells, enhancing its environment control.
Has a powerful presence in both melee and spellcasting.
spellcasting: The River King can cast spells like control weather and freedom of movement, utilizing Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
test_queries: versatile river guardian with spellcasting abilities
magical creature dwelling near water bodies
creature that controls whirlpools and weather
